channel.title: Inthebag. Weekly on Adventures in Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Inthebag. Weekly on Adventures in Hugo

item.title: In The Bag #12 - Week 10 2017
item.description: Welcome to the twelfth edition of _In The Bag! _ In The Bag #12 - Week 10 2017 Technology Cloud outages and the couch architects all over the world Luca has written a great article about the recent AWS S3 outage, it’s sane, articulate and well worth a read. What’s New in VMware Validated Design for Software-Defined Data Center 4.0 I’m a huge fan of the VVD, and the new additions in 4.
